name: Battlefield
description: A large open area with diverse terrain, including hills, forests, and rivers. Ideal for both long-range and close-quarters combat.
layout: Open-world with multiple points of interest, including a central town and several outposts.

name: Urban Warfare
description: A densely populated city environment with narrow streets and tall buildings. Perfect for tactical gameplay and ambushes.
layout: Multi-level structures with rooftops and underground passages.

name: Desert Storm
description: A vast desert landscape with limited cover and visibility. Players must use vehicles and teamwork to navigate effectively.
layout: Wide open spaces with occasional rocky outcrops and small villages.

name: Jungle Ambush
description: A thick jungle environment that provides ample cover and opportunities for stealth. Players can use the foliage to their advantage.
layout: Dense vegetation with hidden paths and water bodies.

name: Snowy Tundra
description: A cold, snowy landscape that challenges players with visibility issues and harsh weather conditions. Great for sniping and long-range engagements.
layout: Open fields with scattered buildings and natural cover.
